    Description
    Biquad

    A complex pair
    DirectFormAbstract
    Abstract form of the a filter which can have different state variables Direct form I or II is derived from it
    LayoutBase
    Digital/analogue filter coefficient storage space organising the storage as PoleZeroPairs so that we have as always a 2nd order filter
